docs.lead_paragraph: ''The Inflammation Cure,'' by Dr. William Joel Meggs, with Carol Svec. Contemporary Books, $19.95. ''Lupus, the First Year,'' by Nancy C. Hanger. Marlowe & Company, $15.95. Inflammation keeps people alive after injuries or infections by limiting damage to their bodies, but when it is out of control, it gives rise to a host of ailments and autoimmune disorders like lupus and rheumatoid arthritis.
docs.abstract: Book The Inflammation Cure by Dr William Joel Meggs, East Carolina University Brody School of Medicine inflammation specialist, discusses how inflammation effects sickness and health; gives suggestions on ways to maintain inflammation balance; specific disease-relevant issues discussed; Nancy C Hanger's book Lupus, The First Year, gives patient-expert viewpoint of Lupus on both physical and emotional level; photos (M)
